content: piece in half with the ws facing place the elastic in between and use optional sewing clips to keep the knit sides closed together with the lh needle pick up a loop from the co edge knit the loop together with the first working st on the needle continue as above until all sts of the co edge have been knit together with the working sts the waistband will now be closed with the elastic sewn between continue to hip increases hip increases we will now start increasing for the hips with an eyelet row as follows round 1 *knit 23 25 27 29 31 33 35 37 39 41 43 45 47 49 * pm k2 pm knit 46 50 54 58 62 66 70 74 78 82 86 90 94 98 pm k2 pm repeat from *-* to bor m round 2 *purl 23 25 27 29 31 33 35 37 39 41 43 45 47 49 * yo sl m p2 sl m yo purl 46 50 54 58 62 66 70 74 78 82 86 90 94 98 yo sl m p2 sl m yo repeat from *-* to bor m = 4 st increased round 3 knit to end knit the yarn overs tbl round 4 *yo k2tog* repeat from *-* to end round 5 knit to end knit the yarn overs as a regular k st round 6 *purl to m yo slip m p2 slip m yo* *repeat from *-* purl to bor m = 4 st increased increases for hips a are now complete continue to stockinette next start increasing in stockinette round 1-3 knit round 4 *knit to m yo slip m k2 slip m yo* *repeat from *-* knit to bor m = 4 st increased continue increasing every 4th round as above remember to knit the yarn overs tbl on the next round work the following increases for your hip size hips b | repeat rounds 1-4 one more time = 16 st increased total hips c | repeat rounds 1-4 three more times = 24 st increased total hips d | repeat rounds 1-4 five more times = 32 st increased total after completing the hip increases remove the 4 markers from the sides stockinette knit in stockinette for 65 rounds or until the skirt measures 38 cm | 15 inch measured from the edge of the waistband the total number of sts depends on your size and chosen hip section make sure it is a multiple of 8 the charts are worked from right to left knit the eyelet detail as below continue to lace section 1 note between each lace section we work the eyelet or stockinette detail as below eyelet detail round 1 purl round 2 knit stockinette detail round 3 *yo k2tog* to end round 1 purl round 4 as round 2 round 2 3 4 knit round 5 as round 1 round 5 as round 1 4/6 www mipithelabel com mipi lace section
